mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.*, COALESCE(c.gwidx, 0) AS gwidx FROM GATHERING_INFO1234 a JOIN IMAGE1234 b ON b.GIIDX = a.GIIDX LEFT JOIN gathering_wish1234 c ON c.GIIDX = a.GIIDX WHERE b.IMGTYPE = 'GT' AND ROWNUM <= 8

SELECT a.*, b.*, COALESCE(c.gwidx, 0) AS gwidx FROM GATHERING_INFO1234 a JOIN IMAGE1234 b ON b.GIIDX = a.GIIDX LEFT JOIN gathering_wish1234 c ON c.GIIDX = a.GIIDX WHERE b.IMGTYPE = 'GT' ORDER BY a.GIIDX OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT 8 ROWS ONLY

SELECT a.GIIDX,a.GINFONAME,a.GINFOBRIEFINTRODUCTION,a.GINFOCAPACITY,a.GINFOPARTICIPATING,b.IMAGENAME, COALESCE(c.gwidx, 0) AS gwidx FROM GATHERING_INFO1234 a JOIN IMAGE1234 b ON b.GIIDX = a.GIIDX JOIN GATHERING1234 c ON c.GIIDX = a.GIIDX LEFT JOIN gathering_wish1234 c ON c.GIIDX = a.GIIDX WHERE b.IMGTYPE = 'GT' AND c.midx = #{0} AND a.GINFODELYN = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GATHERING1234 a WHERE midx = #{1} AND giidx = #{0} AND GATHERINGAPPROVALTYPE = 'Y'

SELECT a.GIIDX,GINFONAME,GINFOAREA,GINFOBRIEFINTRODUCTION,GINFOAREAINTRODUCTION,GINFOCAPACITY,GINFOPARTICIPATING ,IMAGENAME,IMGTYPE ,GATHERINGAPPROVALTYPE,GATHERINGMEMBERTYPE ,c.MIDX ,d.MEMBERNAME,d.MEMBERPROFILE FROM GATHERING_INFO1234 a JOIN IMAGE1234 b ON b.GIIDX = a.GIIDX JOIN GATHERING1234 c ON a.GIIDX = c.giidx JOIN member1234 d ON c.midx = d.midx WHERE b.IMGTYPE = 'G' AND a.GINFODELYN = 'N' AND c.GATHERINGMEMBERTYPE = 'TL' AND a.GIIDX = #{0}
SELECT a.*,b.MEMBERPROFILE FROM GATHERING1234 a JOIN MEMBER1234 b ON b.midx = a.midx WHERE a.GIIDX = 62 AND b.MEMBERDELYN = 'N' AND a.GATHERINGMEMBERDELYN = 'N'
SELECT * FROM GATHERING_BOARD1234 a WHERE a.GIIDX = #{0} AND gBoardDelYN = 'N' AND gBoardCategory ='공지사항' ORDER BY GBOARDWRITEDAY DESC
SELECT ginfojointype FROM GATHERING_INFO1234 a WHERE a.GIIDX = #{0} AND GINFODELYN = 'N'
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM gathering_wish1234 WHERE giidx = #{0} and midx = #{1}
mapper.select: SELECT a.GIIDX,a.GINFONAME,a.GINFOBRIEFINTRODUCTION,a.GINFOCAPACITY,a.GINFOPARTICIPATING,b.IMAGENAME, COALESCE(c.gwidx, 0) AS gwidx FROM GATHERING_INFO1234 a JOIN IMAGE1234 b ON b.GIIDX = a.GIIDX JOIN GATHERING1234 c ON c.GIIDX = a.GIIDX JOIN gathering_wish1234 c ON c.GIIDX = a.GIIDX WHERE b.IMGTYPE = 'GT' AND c.midx = #{0} AND a.GINFODELYN = 'N'

SELECT a.GIIDX, a.GINFONAME, a.GINFOBRIEFINTRODUCTION, a.GINFOCAPACITY, a.GINFOPARTICIPATING, b.IMAGENAME,COALESCE(d.gwidx, 0) AS gwidx FROM GATHERING_INFO1234 a JOIN IMAGE1234 b ON b.GIIDX = a.GIIDX JOIN GATHERING1234 c ON c.GIIDX = a.GIIDX LEFT JOIN gathering_wish1234 d ON d.GIIDX = a.GIIDX JOIN MEMBER1234 e ON e.midx = c.midx WHERE b.IMGTYPE = 'GT' AND a.GINFODELYN = 'N' AND e.memberdelyn='N'
AND a.GINFONAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
GROUP BY a.GIIDX, a.GINFONAME, a.GINFOBRIEFINTRODUCTION, a.GINFOCAPACITY, a.GINFOPARTICIPATING, b.IMAGENAME, COALESCE(d.gwidx, 0)
SELECT * FROM gathering_schedule1234 WHERE GSCHEDULEDELYN = 'N' AND GIIDX = #{0}
SELECT * FROM gathering_schedule1234 WHERE GSCHEDULEDELYN = 'N' AND GSIDX = #{0} AND GIIDX = #{1}

sql.if: and gBoardCategory ='일상' and (gBoardTitle like '%'|| #{scri.keyword} ||'%' OR gBoardContents like '%'|| #{scri.keyword} ||'%')
and gBoardCategory ='취미' and (gBoardTitle like '%'|| #{scri.keyword} ||'%' OR gBoardContents like '%'|| #{scri.keyword} ||'%')
and gBoardCategory ='정모' and (gBoardTitle like '%'|| #{scri.keyword} ||'%' OR gBoardContents like '%'|| #{scri.keyword} ||'%')
and gBoardCategory ='가입인사' (and gBoardTitle like '%'|| #{scri.keyword} ||'%' OR gBoardContents like '%'|| #{scri.keyword} ||'%')
and gBoardCategory ='공지사항' (and gBoardTitle like '%'|| #{scri.keyword} ||'%' OR gBoardContents like '%'|| #{scri.keyword} ||'%')

mapper.select: SELECT count(*) as cnt FROM GATHERING_BOARD1234 a JOIN member1234 b ON b.midx = a.midx JOIN GATHERING1234 c ON c.giidx = a.giidx AND c.midx = a.midx WHERE gBoardDelYN = 'N' AND memberdelyn = 'N' AND gatheringMemberDelYN = 'N' AND a.GIIDX = #{giidx}

SELECT a.*, b.memberName, b.memberProfile, c.gatheringMemberType FROM GATHERING_BOARD1234 a JOIN member1234 b ON b.midx = a.midx JOIN GATHERING1234 c ON c.giidx = a.giidx AND c.midx = a.midx WHERE gBoardDelYN = 'N' AND memberdelyn = 'N' AND gatheringMemberDelYN = 'N' AND a.GIIDX = #{0} AND a.GBIDX = #{1}
mapper.update: UPDATE GATHERING_BOARD1234 SET gBoardViewsCNT = gBoardViewsCNT + 1 where gbidx= #{gbidx}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM gathering_comment1234 WHERE gcidx = #{gcidx} AND gbidx = #{gbidx} AND midx = #{midx} AND gCommentDelYN = 'N'
SELECT gCommentContents FROM gathering_comment1234 WHERE gcidx = #{gcidx} AND gbidx = #{gbidx} AND midx = #{midx} AND gCommentDelYN = 'N'

SELECT count(*) as cnt FROM Gathering_Comment1234 a JOIN GATHERING_BOARD1234 b ON b.GBIDX = a.GBIDX JOIN member1234 c ON c.midx = a.midx JOIN GATHERING1234 d ON d.midx = a.midx AND d.giidx = b.giidx WHERE memberdelyn = 'N' AND gatheringMemberDelYN = 'N' AND gCommentDelYN = 'N' AND a.gbidx = #{gbidx}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, A.* FROM ( SELECT a.*, c.memberName, c.memberProfile, d.gatheringMemberType FROM Gathering_Comment1234 a JOIN GATHERING_BOARD1234 b ON b.GBIDX = a.GBIDX JOIN member1234 c ON c.midx = a.midx JOIN GATHERING1234 d ON d.giidx = b.giidx AND d.midx = a.midx WHERE gBoardDelYN = 'N' AND memberdelyn = 'N' AND gatheringMemberDelYN = 'N' AND gCommentDelYN = 'N' AND a.gbidx = #{gbidx} ORDER BY regcidx DESC, gCommentDepth asc , gCommentWriteDay DESC ) A ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN (#{scri.page}-1)*#{scri.perPageNum}+1 AND #{scri.page}*#{scri.perPageNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gathering_declaration1234(gdix, giidx, midx, gatheringReportContent, gatheringDeclarationDay) values(gdix_seq.NEXTVAL, #{giidx}, #{midx}, #{gatheringReportContent},sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT GATHERINGMEMBERTYPE FROM GATHERING1234 a JOIN MEMBER1234 b ON b.midx = a.midx WHERE a.GIIDX = #{0} AND b.MEMBERDELYN = 'N' AND a.GATHERINGMEMBERDELYN = 'N' AND b.midx = #{1}

SELECT a.*, b.memberProfile, b.memberName, b.memberIntro, b.memberAddr FROM GATHERING1234 a JOIN MEMBER1234 b ON b.midx = a.midx WHERE a.GIIDX = #{GIIDX} AND b.MEMBERDELYN = 'N' AND a.GATHERINGMEMBERDELYN = 'N' ORDER BY CASE WHEN a.GATHERINGMEMBERTYPE = 'TL' THEN 1 WHEN a.GATHERINGMEMBERTYPE = 'TLM' THEN 2 WHEN a.GATHERINGMEMBERTYPE = 'TM' THEN 3 ELSE 4 END
mapper.update: UPDATE GATHERING1234 SET GATHERINGMEMBERTYPE = 'TLD' WHERE giidx = #{1} and midx = #{0}
UPDATE GATHERING1234 SET GATHERINGMEMBERDELYN = 'Y' WHERE giidx = #{0} and midx = #{1}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM gathering1234 WHERE midx = #{0} AND giidx = #{1} AND GATHERINGMEMBERTYPE IN ('TM', 'TMD')
